name: Neon Soldier
description:
You are playing as a soldier. No special abilities. No superpowers. Just shooting, good old shooting. And of course, a lot of enemies ahead. Defeat them all. But if you are looking for some real challenge try the bosses.

Neon Soldier is 2D platformer action game. It is hard and primary intended for those who are looking for something challenging. Game contains five unique levels, five unique boss fights and infinite arena mode.
